layman_description: Special gamepad trigger resistance when aiming with Xbox controllers.
technical_description: Controller trigger tension haptic feedback for aiming.
player_impact: Makes aiming feel more realistic with trigger resistance.

layman_description: Special PlayStation 5 controller vibration when shooting.
technical_description: DualSense haptic engine feedback event reference.
player_impact: PS5 controller creates immersive shooting feedback.

layman_description: Special PlayStation 5 trigger resistance when aiming.
technical_description: DualSense adaptive trigger haptic for aiming.
player_impact: Makes aiming feel more realistic on PS5.

layman_description: Combined PS5 trigger and vibration feedback when shooting.
technical_description: Dual haptic event for DualSense shooting feedback.
player_impact: Enhances shooting feel with combined PS5 feedback.

layman_description: Xbox controller vibration pattern when firing this weapon.
technical_description: Rumble effect specification for Xbox controller feedback.
player_impact: Makes guns feel more impactful with vibration.

layman_description: Xbox trigger vibration pattern when shooting.
technical_description: Controller haptic sequence for trigger feedback on fire.
player_impact: Trigger vibrates to simulate gun kickback.

layman_description: What terrain texture this block appears as when placed in the world.
technical_description: Terrain layer reference for surface rendering.
player_impact: Affects how the block blends with surrounding terrain.

layman_description: Whether this block is purely decorative and doesn't provide function.
technical_description: Boolean flag indicating cosmetic-only block status.
player_impact: Decorative blocks don't provide benefits like insulation or support.

layman_description: Whether zombies and mobs can spawn on top of this block.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling spawn point validation.
player_impact: Affects where zombies can appear in your area.

layman_description: Whether you can respawn or start on this block.
technical_description: Boolean flag for player spawn point acceptance.
player_impact: Determines valid respawn locations in your base.

layman_description: Whether you can pick up and move this block after placing it.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling block pickup mechanic.
player_impact: Some blocks can be moved, others are permanent.

layman_description: Whether this block can be placed anywhere without restrictions.
technical_description: Boolean flag disabling placement validation checks.
player_impact: Some decorative blocks ignore normal placement rules.

layman_description: Whether this visual placeholder doesn't block movement or bullets.
technical_description: Boolean flag for collision disabling on imposter geometry.
player_impact: You can walk through decorative placeholder blocks.

layman_description: Whether to skip showing the visual version of this block at distance.
technical_description: Boolean flag for distant imposter culling.
player_impact: Distant blocks might look simplified or hidden.

layman_description: When you place this block, it rotates randomly instead of snapping to grid.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling random rotation on placement.
player_impact: Decorative blocks face random directions for variety.

layman_description: This block only rotates in 4 directions (North, South, East, West).
technical_description: Boolean restricting rotation to cardinal directions.
player_impact: Some blocks lock to specific orientations.

layman_description: This block can be placed at any rotation angle, not just cardinal directions.
technical_description: Boolean flag enabling 360-degree placement rotation.
player_impact: Gives more freedom in placing decorative blocks.

layman_description: What rotations are allowed when placing this block.
technical_description: Enum defining rotation constraint type (No45, Basic90, All, Basic90And45).
player_impact: Controls how flexible you are in block placement.

layman_description: Custom color tint applied to glass or transparent blocks.
technical_description: RGB color modifier for transparent surface rendering.
player_impact: Tinted glass creates colored light effects and visibility blocks.

layman_description: Whether you can place this decorative block on sloped or angled surfaces.
technical_description: Boolean flag for slope-compatible placement.
player_impact: Lets you place decorations on hillsides and ramps.
